===Etymology===
In Japan, [[regulation]] about facing street is [[stipulated]] in the Building Standards Act. The regulation is [[called]] "接道[[義務]]".

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|せつどう|y=on}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|せつどう}}

# {{lb|ja|real estate}} [[facing]] [[street]]. - refers to the [[land]] ([[site]]) facing on the street.

====Related terms====
* {{l|ja|接}} - "facing"
* {{l|ja|道}} - "street"
